00205   class TriggerValue_t {
00206   public:
00207     TriggerValue_t() : _mask(0) {};
00208     TriggerValue_t(unsigned int a_mask, short delay, unsigned short jitter) : _mask(a_mask), _delay(delay),_jitter(jitter) {};
00209 
00210     unsigned int mask() const {return _mask;};
00211     int delay() const {return _delay;};
00212     int jitter() const {return _jitter;};
00213 
00217     bool operator<(const TriggerValue_t &a) const { return ( mask() < a.mask() ? true : false );} 
00218 
00219     void set(unsigned int a_mask) {_mask=a_mask;};
00220     
00221     unsigned int _mask;
00222     short          _delay;
00223     unsigned short _jitter;
00224   };

00263   unsigned int getUsedFifoDepth() const {return (_theTriggerFifoCont.size()>=2 ? _theTriggerFifoCont.size()-2 : 0);}
00264 
00267   bool hasTriggerFifo() const {return (_theTriggerFifoCont.size()>0);}
00268  
00272   bool isTriggerFifoDepthGood() {return (_theTriggerFifoCont.size()>static_cast<unsigned int>(_main_word+1));}
00273 
00275   inline const int getTriggerFifoContMainWord() {
00276     if(_this_trigger_main_word > 0) {
00277       if( _theTriggerFifoCont.size() > static_cast<unsigned int>(_this_trigger_main_word)) return
00278                                                                                              _theTriggerFifoCont.at(static_cast<unsigned int>(_this_trigger_main_word));           
00279       else {
00280         std::cout << "Main word is at " << _this_trigger_main_word << " but size of fifo is: " << _theTriggerFifoCont.size() << std::endl;
00281         std::cout << "Will return 0" << std::endl;
00282         return 0; 
00283       }
00284     }
00285     return 0;
00286   }
00287 
00288 
00290   int getTriggerFifoContaWord(unsigned int theWord) const {
00291 
00292     if( _theTriggerFifoCont.size() > theWord) return _theTriggerFifoCont.at(theWord);
00293     else {
00294       std::cout << "Required word is " << theWord << " but size of fifo is: " << _theTriggerFifoCont.size() << std::endl;
00295       std::cout << "Will return 0" << std::endl;
00296     }   
00297     return 0;
00298   }

00305   int getMainWord() const { return _main_word;}
00306 
00307 
00310   const unsigned int getSmearedTriggerMainWord() {
00311 #ifdef TRIGGER_HANDLER_IS_SINGLETON
00312     if(!_isInitialized) init();
00313 #endif
00314 
00315     // todo: only if boundary check is enabled ?
00316     unsigned int used_fifo_depth=getUsedFifoDepth();
00317     if(_this_trigger_main_word < 0 ) return 0;
00318     if (used_fifo_depth < static_cast<unsigned int>(_this_trigger_main_word)) return 0;
00319 
00320     unsigned int smeared_trigger_word = _theTriggerFifoCont.at(static_cast<unsigned int>(_this_trigger_main_word));
00321     if (_this_trigger_main_word>0)  smeared_trigger_word |= _theTriggerFifoCont.at(_this_trigger_main_word-1);
00322     if (static_cast<unsigned int>(_this_trigger_main_word+1) < used_fifo_depth ) 
00323       smeared_trigger_word |= _theTriggerFifoCont.at(_this_trigger_main_word+1);
00324 
00325     return smeared_trigger_word;
00326   }

00569   class Crate_t {
00570   public:
00571     Crate_t() : _subDetID(UINT_MAX),_oneDetectorOnly(true) {};
00572     
00573     Crate_t(unsigned int sub_det_i) : _subDetID(sub_det_i),_oneDetectorOnly(true) {};
00574     
00577     bool isUsed() const {
00578       return !_subDetID.empty();
00579     }
00580     
00583     bool isUsedByMultipleSubDetectors() const {return _subDetID.size()>1;};
00584     
00588     void setSubDetectorID(unsigned int a_sub_dector) {
00589       _subDetID.push_back(a_sub_dector);
00590     };
00591     
00594     bool isConnectedToSubDetector(unsigned int a_sub_dector) const {
00595       return std::find(_subDetID.begin(), _subDetID.end(), a_sub_dector ) != _subDetID.end();
00596     }
00597     
00600     SlotList_t &slotList()             {return _slots;};
00601     
00604     const SlotList_t &slotList() const {return _slots;};
00605     
00606   private:
00607     std::vector<unsigned int> _subDetID;
00608     bool         _oneDetectorOnly;
00609     SlotList_t   _slots;
00610   };
